# Problem 1
```{r}
set.seed(10)

iris_with_missing = iris %>% 
  map_df(~replace(.x, sample(1:150, 20), NA)) %>%
  mutate(Species = as.character(Species))
```

```{r}
#Function
problem_1_function = function(x) {
  
  if (is.numeric(x)) {
    replace(x, values = mean(x))
  } else if (is.character(x)){
    replace(x, values = "virginica")
  }

  View(x)
}
```
